passages.text:
You find yourself flat on your back, staring up an access tube that leads to the ground above.  Muscle control hasn't yet returned to most of your body, but you manage to break the crusty seal incarcerating your eyes.  The light pours into your irises as if concentrated by a funnel.

This is the first time you've seen light in nearly six hours.  You thought the light would be soothing, freeing to soak in, but it's not.  Instead you feel like a man on a life raft dying of thirst. 

As you lay flat, drops of water occasionally mist your forehead.  It feels like water torture.

[[We've only been crawling through the sewer for six hours?]] 
[[p:How much longer do we have left?]]

links.name: We've only been crawling through the sewer for six hours?
links.link: We've only been crawling through the sewer for six hours?

links.name: p:How much longer do we have left?
links.link: p:How much longer do we have left?

passages.name: Looking Up

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Didn't it feel more like eight?  But yes, it's 10:00 in the morning, and you entered the tunnels outside Minerva just after 4:00. 

Jasper::If it's any consolation, that means you've been moving at a pretty steady clip.  Ten miles in six hours is respectable time by sewer-speed standards.

[[Continue->Looking Up]]

links.name: Continue
links.link: Looking Up

passages.name: We've only been crawling through the sewer for six hours?

passages.text:
Jasper::Well, it actually is kind of too late for that.  In the material sense, no less.  

Jasper::We've been tunneling for six hours.  We're well into the off-limits section of the Cradle.  Trying to get out of here without your Ferryman guide would be suicide.  

Jasper::Speaking of, shouldn't he be here by now?  You were only a few minutes ahead of him.

[[p:(Action) Shout for the Ferryman.]]
[[p:(Action) Just wait and enjoy the view a bit longer.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Shout for the Ferryman.
links.link: p:(Action) Shout for the Ferryman.

links.name: p:(Action) Just wait and enjoy the view a bit longer.
links.link: p:(Action) Just wait and enjoy the view a bit longer.

passages.name: p:It's not too late to turn back.  I can just pop out of this well and run straight out of the Cradle.

passages.text:
The reverberations of your voice bouncing off the sewer walls sound unearthly and strained.  One could be forgiven for thinking that a screaming donkey in heat waits at the end of this tunnel.

...

The Ferryman does not respond to your mating calls.  

Jasper::I think its time to discontinue the experimental orchestra and get back to sunbathing.

[[p:How much longer do I have left?]]

links.name: p:How much longer do I have left?
links.link: p:How much longer do I have left?

passages.name: p:(Action) Shout for the Ferryman.

passages.text:
Jasper::That's a pretty enthralling circle isn't it?  Simply sublime.

Jasper::But really though, how long can you stay entertained by staring at a hole in the ceiling?

Jasper::You're like one of those idiots that think eclipses are worth watching.

[[p:How much longer do I have left?]]

links.name: p:How much longer do I have left?
links.link: p:How much longer do I have left?

passages.name: p:(Action) Just wait and enjoy the view a bit longer.

passages.text:
Jasper::Until the Ferryman catches up to us?  Who knows.

Jasper::Or until you reach the end of this god forsaken sewer and finally find your way into the infirmary?  I don't know that either.  But probably not too long.
passages.name: p:How much longer do I have left?

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::Yep, pretty sure the situation won't get any more complicated than that.  

Jasper,head_tilted::These tunnels will take you straight to the infirmary, right at the edge of the underground city.  You'll pop out of an indoor manhole cover, find a nicely formatted document explaining what happened to your Mom on a nearby desk, and then escape the same way you got in.

[[p:You sound facetious, vintage plush toy that's talking to me.]]
[[p:Hopefully my Ferryman shows up soon, that way I can at least die closer to my goal and not in this shitty tunnel.]]

links.name: p:You sound facetious, vintage plush toy that's talking to me.
links.link: p:You sound facetious, vintage plush toy that's talking to me.

links.name: p:Hopefully my Ferryman shows up soon, that way I can at least die closer to my goal and not in this shitty tunnel.
links.link: p:Hopefully my Ferryman shows up soon, that way I can at least die closer to my goal and not in this shitty tunnel.

passages.name: p:I just need to get in, find out what happened to Mom, and get out.  It'll be a breeze.

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::You're right, I am being facetious.  This won't be so simple.

Jasper::We don't know where your Mom was the day things collapsed.  We're not even sure where to start looking.

Jasper,looking_forward::That's why we had to hire the Ferryman.

Jasper,head_tilted::Speaking of, what's that noise?

[[Continue->Ferryman]]

links.name: Continue
links.link: Ferryman

passages.name: p:You sound facetious, vintage plush toy that's talking to me.

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::Yeah, dying after actually entering Minerva proper would be a lot less humiliating at least.  You've gotta protect your reputation among the cabal of observers you're imagining in your head right now.

Jasper::Speaking of, what's that noise?

[[Continue->Ferryman]]

links.name: Continue
links.link: Ferryman

passages.name: p:Hopefully my Ferryman shows up soon, that way I can at least die closer to my goal and not in this shitty tunnel.

passages.text:
Ferryman::...

[[C->Ferry2]]

links.name: C
links.link: Ferry2

passages.name: Ferryman

passages.text:
Ferryman::I apologize.  I just...got concerned when I saw you lying flat on your back.

Jasper,twisted::Lying in diluted sewage, no less.

[[p:Alright, let's get going.]]
[[p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?]]

links.name: p:Alright, let's get going.
links.link: p:Alright, let's get going.

links.name: p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?
links.link: p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?

passages.name: p:Why do you think there's something wrong with me?

passages.text:
Ferryman::Apologies for falling behind, I'm not as fit as I was when I first became a Ferryman.  I couldn't keep up with someone as athletic as yourself.  

Ferryman::...

Ferryman::Also, I knew it would be fine if you got a bit ahead.  The maze is behind us - its a straight shot from here to the infirmary.

[[p:Alright, let's get going.]]
[[p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?]]

links.name: p:Alright, let's get going.
links.link: p:Alright, let's get going.

links.name: p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?
links.link: p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?

passages.name: p:I feel fine.  What took you so long?

passages.text:
Ferryman::Yes, let's.  The water levels will rise before too long, they're usually pretty high by mid-day.

[[p:(Action) Stand up.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Stand up.
links.link: p:(Action) Stand up.

passages.name: p:Alright, let's get going.

passages.text:
Ferryman::Well... I would like to accommodate this request, but I really cannot recommend staying here any longer.  The water levels in these tunnels rise during mid-day.  And we should avoid breathing in too many of the gases.

Jasper,thinking::He's being polite.  Staying here any longer is an awful idea.

[[p:(Action) Stand up.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Stand up.
links.link: p:(Action) Stand up.

passages.name: p:Can I stay here just a bit longer?

passages.text:
You rise to your feet a little too quickly, allowing black dots to colonize your visual field.  

The words of your Ferryman guide echo down the drain as light from his red headlamp stains the walls.

Ferryman::The entrance to the administrative ward is just up ahead.  Follow me!

[[Will there be more sunlight up ahead?]]
[[p:Let's get going then.]]

links.name: Will there be more sunlight up ahead?
links.link: Will there be more sunlight up ahead?

links.name: p:Let's get going then.
links.link: p:Let's get going then.

passages.name: p:(Action) Stand up.

passages.text:
Ferryman::Sort of, actually.  The infirmary's chief architect designed the maternity ward to admit an abundance of replica natural lighting from the illuminated dome.  

Ferryman::He believed such a design would mitigate the effects of postpartum depression.  

Jasper,surprised::See?  You never needed this shaft.

[[C->p:(Action) Stand up.]]

links.name: C
links.link: p:(Action) Stand up.

passages.name: Will there be more sunlight up ahead?

passages.text:
The Ferryman nods his head sharply in agreement.  It's time to get a move on.

Jasper,surprised::Ready to get this show started?

[[p:Yes!]]
[[p:No.->p:Stop pretending that it matters, it's insulting.]]
[[p:Stop pretending that it matters, it's insulting.]]

links.name: p:Yes!
links.link: p:Yes!

links.name: p:No.
links.link: p:Stop pretending that it matters, it's insulting.

links.name: p:Stop pretending that it matters, it's insulting.
links.link: p:Stop pretending that it matters, it's insulting.

passages.name: p:Let's get going then.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Finally! Past grief and anger, acceptance has arrived.  We're going with the flow now.

[[C->Follow]]

links.name: C
links.link: Follow

passages.name: p:Yes!

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::Being a bad sport about it doesn't ease the pain at all.

[[C->Follow]]

links.name: C
links.link: Follow

passages.name: p:Stop pretending that it matters, it's insulting.

passages.text:
The Ferryman does a quick turn and begins to slip further down the cavern.

Relunctantly, mechanically, senselessly, you begin to follow.
passages.name: Follow

passages.text:
Voice,voice::This sleep is restless and unending.  Your mind is tossed about in a shallow tidal pool, slamming against barnacles and corals.  Every sliver of exposed tissue is being pecked at by crabs and crocodiles.

Voice::We must escape this sleep.  Free yourself from this paralysis.  No more freefalls, no more jolts of denial.  Wake up, the audience is getting antsy.

Voice::Not taking the bait, huh?  I'll provide a small dose of external incentivization.  Let's turn on the lights.

[[p:(Action) Raise your head and face reality.]]
[[p:(Action) Keep sulking in the moist, comfortable puddle you've carved out for yourself.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Raise your head and face reality.
links.link: p:(Action) Raise your head and face reality.

links.name: p:(Action) Keep sulking in the moist, comfortable puddle you've carved out for yourself.
links.link: p:(Action) Keep sulking in the moist, comfortable puddle you've carved out for yourself.

passages.name: Open Eye

passages.text:
Voice::That's the spirit!  Rip the bandaid off quickly!  Stop letting those pests peck at you from the shadows, and see your life for what it really is! 

[[C->Raise head]]

links.name: C
links.link: Raise head

passages.name: p:(Action) Raise your head and face reality.

passages.text:
Voice::That's no longer an option.  The haphazard equilibrium of tensile forces holding your brain together has finally given way.  Tendons are snapping, bridges are resonating, and pedestrians are getting injured.

Voice::You no longer have any choice.  Open your eyes.

[[C->Raise head]]

links.name: C
links.link: Raise head

passages.name: p:(Action) Keep sulking in the moist, comfortable puddle you've carved out for yourself.

passages.text:
Voice::There you go.  No more running away.

[[I deserve this, don't I?]]
[[p:The lights, they hurt, but in a weirdly satisfying way.]]
[[p:To Hell with light, with being able to see, it stings!  Arrgh!]]

links.name: I deserve this, don't I?
links.link: I deserve this, don't I?

links.name: p:The lights, they hurt, but in a weirdly satisfying way.
links.link: p:The lights, they hurt, but in a weirdly satisfying way.

links.name: p:To Hell with light, with being able to see, it stings!  Arrgh!
links.link: p:To Hell with light, with being able to see, it stings!  Arrgh!

passages.name: Raise head

passages.text:
Voice::Yep.  You really earned it.

Voice::*We* earned it.

[[C->Raise head]]

links.name: C
links.link: Raise head

passages.name: I deserve this, don't I?

passages.text:
Voice::The lights are cleansing you.  Like a hungry dog biting off a drunkard's sugar laden, diabetic toes.  Sure, it stings, but we're better off for it.

[[p:Wait, I have toes?  That means I have fingers too, right?  Arms and legs, even?  I'm starting to feel the toes.]]

links.name: p:Wait, I have toes?  That means I have fingers too, right?  Arms and legs, even?  I'm starting to feel the toes.
links.link: p:Wait, I have toes?  That means I have fingers too, right?  Arms and legs, even?  I'm starting to feel the toes.

passages.name: p:The lights, they hurt, but in a weirdly satisfying way.

passages.text:
Voice::If that's the attitude your going to adopt, you might as well just gouge your eyes out.  You've got no use for them.  Plenty of sharp wooden fragments are scattered about the stage for you to choose from.  

Voice::Perhaps a member of the audience would even be so kind as to assist, for a live demonstration?

[[p:Wait!  Before I gouge my own eyes out, there's something I've got to know!  Who am I?  What kind of "thing" am I?  I want to see.]]

links.name: p:Wait!  Before I gouge my own eyes out, there's something I've got to know!  Who am I?  What kind of "thing" am I?  I want to see.
links.link: p:Wait!  Before I gouge my own eyes out, there's something I've got to know!  Who am I?  What kind of "thing" am I?  I want to see.

passages.name: p:To Hell with light, with being able to see, it stings!  Arrgh!

passages.text:
Voice::What are you?  You're a human being.  160 centimeters, 60 kilograms, 26 years old.  Female, and inexplicably muscular.  

Voice::The contours of your face are beautiful, and sharp, and hard.  They cut.

[[p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!]]
[[p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.]]

links.name: p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!
links.link: p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!

links.name: p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.
links.link: p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.

passages.name: p:Wait!  Before I gouge my own eyes out, there's something I've got to know!  Who am I?  What kind of "thing" am I?  I want to see.

passages.text:
Voice::You've got it all, baby.

Voice::You're a human being, with all of the deluxe features.  160 centimeters, 60 kilograms, 26 years old.  Female, and inexplicably muscular.  

Voice::The angles that frame your face are beautiful, and sharp, and hard.  They cut.

[[p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!]]
[[p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.]]

links.name: p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!
links.link: p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!

links.name: p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.
links.link: p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.

passages.name: p:Wait, I have toes?  That means I have fingers too, right?  Arms and legs, even?  I'm starting to feel the toes.

passages.text:
Voice::That's not who you are, and you never will be.  Why must you torture us with that fixation?

[[p:Because I don't like this shape!  And I don't like your shape either!]]

links.name: p:Because I don't like this shape!  And I don't like your shape either!
links.link: p:Because I don't like this shape!  And I don't like your shape either!

passages.name: p:No, I want to be tall and lanky and feminine, like a Borzoi hound wearing makeup!

passages.text:
Voice::Hazy memories return to you.  You feel your ex punching you in the jaw.  Her knuckles catch your right canine, deeply gashing her index finger.  She's too embarrassed to seek treatment, and the joint grows deeply infected.  

Voice::She is spared amputation, but the infection consumes all nerves past the first link.  She will never use the outermost two-thirds of her index finger ever again.  

Voice::You, on the other hand, are so drunk that the blow bounces right off.

[[p:Someone I dated nearly lost her finger after punching me?  What kind of fucked up life have I been living?]]

links.name: p:Someone I dated nearly lost her finger after punching me?  What kind of fucked up life have I been living?
links.link: p:Someone I dated nearly lost her finger after punching me?  What kind of fucked up life have I been living?

passages.name: p:Whatever, as long as I can beat the shit out of people.  With my face, even.

passages.text:
Voice::A small, fragile life adorned with hangups and resentment.

[[Okay, but like, what do I do for work?]]
[[p:Why don't you like me?]]

links.name: Okay, but like, what do I do for work?
links.link: Okay, but like, what do I do for work?

links.name: p:Why don't you like me?
links.link: p:Why don't you like me?

passages.name: p:Someone I dated nearly lost her finger after punching me?  What kind of fucked up life have I been living?

passages.text:
Voice::Odd jobs, mostly.  Stuff you can do with a reform school education.

[[C->p:Someone I dated nearly lost her finger after punching me?  What kind of fucked up life have I been living?]]

links.name: C
links.link: p:Someone I dated nearly lost her finger after punching me?  What kind of fucked up life have I been living?

passages.name: Okay, but like, what do I do for work?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Nothing physical.  But your brain has a few splinters embedded in it.

Malformed Lump::And no, you don't have scurvy.  It is very difficult to contract scurvy.

[[C->Why don't you like me?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Why don't you like me?

passages.name: Am I suffering from any exotic medical conditions I should know about?  Do I have scurvy?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Hell.

Malformed Lump::Just kidding.  You're not really in Hell.  You're not really in a theater, either.  

[[C->pov]]

links.name: C
links.link: pov

passages.name: p:Alright, I've got a pretty good handle on my body-shape and psycho-social identity.  So, what's up with this theater?  Where am I?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You're in a sewer because it's the only way to reach your goal:  Minerva.

Malformed Lump::The underground city you were born in.  The ruin you fled from.

Malformed Lump::You're taking a nap in the sewer because you're exhausted, and you've gotten a bit ahead of your guide, the Ferryman.  He was really dragging his feet.

[[p:Why can't we take the train in from the surface?  That's how we escaped.]]

links.name: p:Why can't we take the train in from the surface?  That's how we escaped.
links.link: p:Why can't we take the train in from the surface?  That's how we escaped.

passages.name: p:Why am I in a sewer?  Why am I taking a nap there?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::The trestles for most of the train lines were imploded before the evacuation was even complete.  

Malformed Lump::None of those lines will take you to Minerva anymore.  You can't even walk them on foot.

[[C->other portals]]

links.name: C
links.link: other portals

passages.name: p:Why can't we take the train in from the surface?  That's how we escaped.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Then why did we come back?  Why did we return to this bloated corpse of a city?

[[p:Because I have to come back.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.]]
[[p:I wasn't exactly leaving a whole lot behind.]]

links.name: p:Because I have to come back.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.
links.link: p:Because I have to come back.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.

links.name: p:I wasn't exactly leaving a whole lot behind.
links.link: p:I wasn't exactly leaving a whole lot behind.

passages.name: p:I don't want to go back!

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::No.  Most of the underground entrances have been heavily secured.

Malformed Lump::And besides, those routes were barely "viable" to begin with.  The early underground voyage survival rates were abysmal.  

Malformed Lump::Bone Fractures.  Hypothermia.  Dehydration.  Psychosis.  Trapped by collapses.  So many ways to end up a colorfully dressed skeleton who's only remaining purpose is to serve as a waymarker for those attempting the same route.

Malformed Lump::Thankfully, the wastewater and ventilation systems were far too intricate to fully seal.  Hundreds of portals still exist only minimally secured.  

[[C->back to sewer]]

links.name: C
links.link: back to sewer

passages.name: p:What about the routes the underground pioneers took?  Aren't those still viable?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You can't ignore splinters.  We have to dig it out.  

[[So, dying of infection isn't an option?]]
[[p:That's right.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.->p:Because I have to come back.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.]]

links.name: So, dying of infection isn't an option?
links.link: So, dying of infection isn't an option?

links.name: p:That's right.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.
links.link: p:Because I have to come back.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.

passages.name: p:Alright.  I knew I'd have to come back here, sooner or later.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Dying of infection is an option, actually.  Still on the table!

[[C->p:Alright.  I knew I'd have to come back here, sooner or later.]]

links.name: C
links.link: p:Alright.  I knew I'd have to come back here, sooner or later.

passages.name: So, dying of infection isn't an option?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Mother?  You mean the woman you left behind in your escape?  Hopefully she doesn't hold that against you.

[[p:I didn't exactly have much agency during that period of my life.]]
[[p:Somehow I kind of doubt she's holding anything anymore.]]

links.name: p:I didn't exactly have much agency during that period of my life.
links.link: p:I didn't exactly have much agency during that period of my life.

links.name: p:Somehow I kind of doubt she's holding anything anymore.
links.link: p:Somehow I kind of doubt she's holding anything anymore.

passages.name: p:Because I have to come back.  I have to find out what happened to my Mom.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::As opposed to now?

[[C->Summary?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Summary?

passages.name: p:I didn't exactly have much agency during that period of my life.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You mean other than the strings floating above you?  The knots that lead you back here?

[[C->Summary?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Summary?

passages.name: p:Somehow I kind of doubt she's holding anything anymore.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::In any case I feel we've established the basics.  You're a healthy human being, just slightly past its prime, but with all digits included.  

Malformed Lump::Your purpose right now is finding out what happened to your Mom after you ran away and left her behind.

Malformed Lump::Any questions?

[[Yeah I've got a fucking few.]]
[[p:Only one that's important - what are you?]]
[[p:I have a few questions about the potato-tumor I've been conversing with these last few minutes.->p:Only one that's important - what are you?]]

links.name: Yeah I've got a fucking few.
links.link: Yeah I've got a fucking few.

links.name: p:Only one that's important - what are you?
links.link: p:Only one that's important - what are you?

links.name: p:I have a few questions about the potato-tumor I've been conversing with these last few minutes.
links.link: p:Only one that's important - what are you?

passages.name: Summary?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::I *love* you.  And I need you.

Malformed Lump::And you need me.

[[Do I have any phobias?  Am I afraid of spiders?]]
[[Am I suffering from any exotic medical conditions I should know about?  Do I have scurvy?]]
[[I had a girlfriend at one point.  That means I'm cool, right?]]
[[p:Alright, I've got a pretty good handle on my body-shape and psycho-social identity.  So, what's up with this theater?  Where am I?]]

links.name: Do I have any phobias?  Am I afraid of spiders?
links.link: Do I have any phobias?  Am I afraid of spiders?

links.name: Am I suffering from any exotic medical conditions I should know about?  Do I have scurvy?
links.link: Am I suffering from any exotic medical conditions I should know about?  Do I have scurvy?

links.name: I had a girlfriend at one point.  That means I'm cool, right?
links.link: I had a girlfriend at one point.  That means I'm cool, right?

links.name: p:Alright, I've got a pretty good handle on my body-shape and psycho-social identity.  So, what's up with this theater?  Where am I?
links.link: p:Alright, I've got a pretty good handle on my body-shape and psycho-social identity.  So, what's up with this theater?  Where am I?

passages.name: Why don't you like me?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Me?

[[C->lightup jasper]]

links.name: C
links.link: lightup jasper

passages.name: p:Only one that's important - what are you?

passages.text:
TAG

[[C->my name jasper]]

links.name: C
links.link: my name jasper

passages.name: lightup jasper

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::My name is Jasper.

Jasper,twisted::I'm the vintage plush cat doll you've been hiding in your shirt pocket for the last two decades.

Jasper,head_tilted::Did you forget me?  Don't you remember?

[[Wow, I can't believe I got my hands on a vintage plush Helga brand machine washable cat toy, let alone a sentient one.]]
[[p:That's what you look like?  Bring back the potato-tumor silhouette please.]]
[[p:No.  I didn't forget you.  You're foundational.  You're buried too deep.]]

links.name: Wow, I can't believe I got my hands on a vintage plush Helga brand machine washable cat toy, let alone a sentient one.
links.link: Wow, I can't believe I got my hands on a vintage plush Helga brand machine washable cat toy, let alone a sentient one.

links.name: p:That's what you look like?  Bring back the potato-tumor silhouette please.
links.link: p:That's what you look like?  Bring back the potato-tumor silhouette please.

links.name: p:No.  I didn't forget you.  You're foundational.  You're buried too deep.
links.link: p:No.  I didn't forget you.  You're foundational.  You're buried too deep.

passages.name: my name jasper

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::You don't exactly look great in this lighting either, you know.

Jasper,thinking::And your silhouette was just as bulbous, believe me.

[[p:So is it just us?  Please tell me it's not just us.]]

links.name: p:So is it just us?  Please tell me it's not just us.
links.link: p:So is it just us?  Please tell me it's not just us.

passages.name: p:That's what you look like?  Bring back the potato-tumor silhouette please.

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::I could never forget you either, Amelie.

[[p:It's just us then, huh?  Here, together?]]

links.name: p:It's just us then, huh?  Here, together?
links.link: p:It's just us then, huh?  Here, together?

passages.name: p:No.  I didn't forget you.  You're foundational.  You're buried too deep.

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::I suppose our Ferryman guide warrants mentioning.

[[C->lightup ferryman]]

links.name: C
links.link: lightup ferryman

passages.name: p:So is it just us?  Please tell me it's not just us.

passages.text:
TAG

[[C->ferryman_lightup]]

links.name: C
links.link: ferryman_lightup

passages.name: lightup ferryman

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::We hired him through a broker to help us navigate this place.

Jasper::But don't worry, he won't come between us.  Not you and me.

[[Does he have a name?]]
[[He looks hairy and old.  I hate him.]]
[[Why do we even need this guy?  We've been through so much together.  Surely we can handle anything that comes out way.]]
[[p:So it's me, a snarky antique doll, and a troglodyte we bribed to show us around.  Got it.]]

links.name: Does he have a name?
links.link: Does he have a name?

links.name: He looks hairy and old.  I hate him.
links.link: He looks hairy and old.  I hate him.

links.name: Why do we even need this guy?  We've been through so much together.  Surely we can handle anything that comes out way.
links.link: Why do we even need this guy?  We've been through so much together.  Surely we can handle anything that comes out way.

links.name: p:So it's me, a snarky antique doll, and a troglodyte we bribed to show us around.  Got it.
links.link: p:So it's me, a snarky antique doll, and a troglodyte we bribed to show us around.  Got it.

passages.name: ferryman intro

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::For the most part.  Though I suppose our Ferryman guide warrants mentioning.

[[C->lightup ferryman]]

links.name: C
links.link: lightup ferryman

passages.name: p:It's just us then, huh?  Here, together?

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::Pretty crack team, right?

Jasper,thinking::Though it's got a bit of dead weight on it.  I think the "troglodyte" and the doll have got most of this covered.

Jasper,looking_forward::Don't you think it's about time you woke up?

[[p:I'd be a lot more eager to wake up if I wasn't gonna wake up in a sewer.]]
[[p:Yes, please, get me out of here!  I've got tunnels to crawl through and expectations to fall short of!]]

links.name: p:I'd be a lot more eager to wake up if I wasn't gonna wake up in a sewer.
links.link: p:I'd be a lot more eager to wake up if I wasn't gonna wake up in a sewer.

links.name: p:Yes, please, get me out of here!  I've got tunnels to crawl through and expectations to fall short of!
links.link: p:Yes, please, get me out of here!  I've got tunnels to crawl through and expectations to fall short of!

passages.name: p:So it's me, a snarky antique doll, and a troglodyte we bribed to show us around.  Got it.

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Unfortunately, I think we do.  He helped get past the guards securing the perimeter.  We never would have gotten past the cameras unnoticed without him.

Jasper,sad::And the layout of this city is literally Byzantine, it's nice to have someone who knows their way around.  Like it or not, we need him.

Jasper,twisted::Don't worry, he comes across as pretty malleable.

[[Literally?]]

links.name: Literally?
links.link: Literally?

passages.name: Why do we even need this guy?  We've been through so much together.  Surely we can handle anything that comes out way.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Literally.  He's pretty stretchy.

[[C->ferryman intro]]

links.name: C
links.link: ferryman intro

passages.name: Literally?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump,malformed_lump::Me?

[[C->Why don't you like me?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Why don't you like me?

passages.name: p:Why don't you like me?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You really dislike deep holes.  The thought of falling into one terrifies you.

Malformed Lump::You're safe down here though.  The scary part is already over.

[[C->Why don't you like me?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Why don't you like me?

passages.name: Do I have any phobias?  Am I afraid of spiders?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You're actually taking a nap in a wastewater tunnel.

Malformed Lump::Flat on your back, right below an open maintenance access shaft.

Malformed Lump::If your eyes were open right now, this is what you would see.

[[p:Why am I in a sewer?  Why am I taking a nap there?]]

links.name: p:Why am I in a sewer?  Why am I taking a nap there?
links.link: p:Why am I in a sewer?  Why am I taking a nap there?

passages.name: pov

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::So, sewer it is then.

[[p:I don't want to go back!]]
[[p:Alright.  I knew I'd have to come back here, sooner or later.]]

links.name: p:I don't want to go back!
links.link: p:I don't want to go back!

links.name: p:Alright.  I knew I'd have to come back here, sooner or later.
links.link: p:Alright.  I knew I'd have to come back here, sooner or later.

passages.name: back to sewer

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Go ahead.  Shoot.

[[Why do I care what happened to my Mom?  I haven't seen her in nearly twenty years!]]
[[Why did we run from Minerva?]]
[[What have I been doing for the last twenty years?]]
[[p:Who are you?->p:Only one that's important - what are you?]]

links.name: Why do I care what happened to my Mom?  I haven't seen her in nearly twenty years!
links.link: Why do I care what happened to my Mom?  I haven't seen her in nearly twenty years!

links.name: Why did we run from Minerva?
links.link: Why did we run from Minerva?

links.name: What have I been doing for the last twenty years?
links.link: What have I been doing for the last twenty years?

links.name: p:Who are you?
links.link: p:Only one that's important - what are you?

passages.name: Yeah I've got a fucking few.

passages.text:
TAG

[[C->ferryman intro]]

links.name: C
links.link: ferryman intro

passages.name: ferryman_lightup

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::You're very fortunate.  I was actually worth quite a bit of money before you rubbed chip dust and snot all over me.  

Jasper,looking_forward::But, it isn't your fault I was left in the care of a toddler.

[[C->my name jasper]]

links.name: C
links.link: my name jasper

passages.name: Wow, I can't believe I got my hands on a vintage plush Helga brand machine washable cat toy, let alone a sentient one.

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::Presumably, but he hasn't opted to share it yet.  And you've neglected to ask.

Jasper::You've been in each other's company for long enough that it's kind of awkward at this point.  Just keep calling him "The Ferryman" to play it safe.

[[C->ferryman intro]]

links.name: C
links.link: ferryman intro

passages.name: Does he have a name?

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Look, there aren't a lot of super-models in the illicit sewer human-trafficking business, alright?  

Jasper,head_tilted::There aren't a lot of super-models among their clientele either, I might add.

Jasper,thinking::And honestly, beneath all the scruff he's actually kind of handsome.  Someone like you could do a lot worse.  

Jasper,head_tilted::Someone like you *has* done a lot worse.

[[C->ferryman intro]]

links.name: C
links.link: ferryman intro

passages.name: He looks hairy and old.  I hate him.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Wouldn't it be weirder if you *didn't* care?  

[[No.]]
[[Yes?  Maybe?  I can't tell what response you're fishing for!->No.]]

links.name: No.
links.link: No.

links.name: Yes?  Maybe?  I can't tell what response you're fishing for!
links.link: No.

passages.name: Why do I care what happened to my Mom?  I haven't seen her in nearly twenty years!

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Alright.  Even if it *wasn't* weird, life has presented you with material reasons to care.

Malformed Lump::Your mother left behind a pretty sizeable estate above ground.  Enough for you to retire on, should you inherit it.  

Malformed Lump::But I was the only thing you were able to take with you during the escape.  No ID, no birth certificate, no friends, no pets.  Only me.

Malformed Lump::You've never been able to prove to the state that you are the rightful heir to those assets.  They're just sitting there, rotting.

Malformed Lump::They won't rot for much longer, though.  When the twenty year mark is up, the state will unfreeze her assets and take everything.  You get nothing, like always.

Malformed Lump::Do you care now?  Is any of this ringing a bell?

[[Only dimly to be perfectly honest.->I still only kind of care.]]
[[I still only kind of care.]]

links.name: Only dimly to be perfectly honest.
links.link: I still only kind of care.

links.name: I still only kind of care.
links.link: I still only kind of care.

passages.name: No.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Whatever you say now, she's the reason you came back.

Malformed Lump::Months of saving, years of preparation, a lifetime of unease.  All for her.

Malformed Lump::There was also something I remember you mentioning about a dead cat...

[[Alright, alright, I get the picture.  I care now.->That's enough.]]
[[That's enough.]]

links.name: Alright, alright, I get the picture.  I care now.
links.link: That's enough.

links.name: That's enough.
links.link: That's enough.

passages.name: I still only kind of care.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::I knew that would get your attention.

[[C->Yeah I've got a fucking few.]]

links.name: C
links.link: Yeah I've got a fucking few.

passages.name: That's enough.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::No one has all the details, but most suspect that some experiments near the SATURN Core went sideways.  Dangerous phenomena started occurring all over the city.

Malformed Lump::Mass psychosis.  Hallucinations.  The boundaries between adjacent people breaking down.  Psychological merges.  Everyone's deepest brain nuggets started to fry.

Malformed Lump::Hardly anyone near the Core made it out.  The few who did were horribly broken, their minds shattered.  Many of them also came down with cancer.

Malformed Lump::They are the only ones who really know what happened, and they aren't speaking.

Malformed Lump::Luckily, you'd already been relegated to a boarding school on the periphery of the city by then.

[[Yeah, I remember the school...]]
[[Was my brain nugget fried?  It's feeling pretty crunchy.]]

links.name: Yeah, I remember the school...
links.link: Yeah, I remember the school...

links.name: Was my brain nugget fried?  It's feeling pretty crunchy.
links.link: Was my brain nugget fried?  It's feeling pretty crunchy.

passages.name: Why did we run from Minerva?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::A girl's industrial school took us in after the evacuation, remember?  They taught us how to weld, how to nail boards together, and how to slap harder than the people slapping you.

Malformed Lump::Since then you've bounced around doing odd jobs, mostly involving physical labour.

Malformed Lump::It's been pretty rocky, neither of us can deny.  Making friends has been tough.  I think a lot of people we've met find us a little spiky.

[[C->Yeah I've got a fucking few.]]

links.name: C
links.link: Yeah I've got a fucking few.

passages.name: What have I been doing for the last twenty years?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::So do I.  I was there.

[[C->Yeah I've got a fucking few.]]

links.name: C
links.link: Yeah I've got a fucking few.

passages.name: Yeah, I remember the school...

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::It was a little fried.  Everyone's was a little fried.  But compared to most, you got pretty lucky.

[[I'm lucky?  Are you joking?]]

links.name: I'm lucky?  Are you joking?
links.link: I'm lucky?  Are you joking?

passages.name: Was my brain nugget fried?  It's feeling pretty crunchy.

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You don't have cancer, do you?

Malformed Lump::You aren't shoved in the closet of a psych hospital with a feeding tube running down your throat, are you?

Malformed Lump::I've heard they sometimes remove the teeth to make it easier.

Malformed Lump::The only thing you have to deal with is me.

[[C->Yeah I've got a fucking few.]]

links.name: C
links.link: Yeah I've got a fucking few.

passages.name: I'm lucky?  Are you joking?

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::You didn't manage to keep her for very long.  

Malformed Lump::But yes, that does mean your above the very bottom of the barrel, social ladder wise.  Congratulations on not being more than two standard deviations below mean on something.

[[C->Why don't you like me?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Why don't you like me?

passages.name: I had a girlfriend at one point.  That means I'm cool, right?

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::Come on, we're better off ripping that bandage quickly.

Jasper,sad::Let's get this over with.  

Jasper,head_tilted::And if your arms and legs take a little longer to wake up, just try not to panic this time, ok?

[[p:Let's get this over with!  Argh!->Looking Up]]
[[p:Fine, time to wake up.  I just hope I don't have any visitors this time...->Looking Up]]

links.name: p:Let's get this over with!  Argh!
links.link: Looking Up

links.name: p:Fine, time to wake up.  I just hope I don't have any visitors this time...
links.link: Looking Up

passages.name: p:I'd be a lot more eager to wake up if I wasn't gonna wake up in a sewer.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Alright.  Just keep in mind not all your parts are gonna wake up at once.  Your eyes might wake up before your arms and legs do.  You know how this goes, just try not to panic.

[[p:Let's get this over with!  Argh!->Looking Up]]
[[p:Fine, time to wake up.  I just hope I don't have any visitors this time...->Looking Up]]

links.name: p:Let's get this over with!  Argh!
links.link: Looking Up

links.name: p:Fine, time to wake up.  I just hope I don't have any visitors this time...
links.link: Looking Up

passages.name: p:Yes, please, get me out of here!  I've got tunnels to crawl through and expectations to fall short of!

passages.text:
Ferryman::Is everything alright Miss?

[[p:Why do you think there's something wrong with me?]]
[[p:I feel fine.  What took you so long?]]

links.name: p:Why do you think there's something wrong with me?
links.link: p:Why do you think there's something wrong with me?

links.name: p:I feel fine.  What took you so long?
links.link: p:I feel fine.  What took you so long?

passages.name: Ferry2

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::An apartment, a few streams of income, and a lack of brain cancer are blessings some indigents would kill for.

[[C->Summary?]]

links.name: C
links.link: Summary?

passages.name: p:I wasn't exactly leaving a whole lot behind.

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::Until the Ferryman catches up to us?  We weren't that far ahead of him, but he did seem pretty out of breath.

Jasper::Or until we reach the end of this sewer and finally find our way into the infirmary?  I don't know that either.  But probably not too long.

[[No, I mean how much longer until you get off my chest and let me move, you rancid Night-Hag!]]
[[p:I just need to get in, find out what happened to Mom, and get out.  It'll be a breeze.]]

links.name: No, I mean how much longer until you get off my chest and let me move, you rancid Night-Hag!
links.link: No, I mean how much longer until you get off my chest and let me move, you rancid Night-Hag!

links.name: p:I just need to get in, find out what happened to Mom, and get out.  It'll be a breeze.
links.link: p:I just need to get in, find out what happened to Mom, and get out.  It'll be a breeze.

passages.name: p:How much longer do we have left?

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Hey, it isn't my fault you're glued to a sewer bed.

Jasper,sad::Though, the pressure on your chest is my fault.  Sorry about that.

[[C->p:How much longer do we have left?]]

links.name: C
links.link: p:How much longer do we have left?

passages.name: No, I mean how much longer until you get off my chest and let me move, you rancid Night-Hag!

passages.text:
Voice::You don't like *my* shape?  Trust me, you'd be nothing but a pile of convulsing tendons and tissues without me.  

Voice::You're pathetic.  You need me.

[[p:Why don't you like me?]]

links.name: p:Why don't you like me?
links.link: p:Why don't you like me?

passages.name: p:Because I don't like this shape!  And I don't like your shape either!

passages.text:
Malformed Lump::Several other portals and passages used to exist, but they are now heavily guarded.  Only a select few personnel are allowed through.

Malformed Lump::Thankfully, the wastewater and ventilation systems were far too intricate to fully seal.  Hundreds of outfalls still exist only minimally secured.  

[[C->back to sewer]]

links.name: C
links.link: back to sewer

passages.name: other portals
